Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Payment Handled occurs

Name: Minimum time for 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' across all cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time for 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases where the next activity is 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurs

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases without 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER does not occur

Name: Average time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in cases with 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases that required director approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Payment Handled' in domestic trip claims
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases followed by a resubmission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum time for 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases ending with 'Payment Handled' without prior rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Total time for 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' before approval
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE occurs

Name: Average time from 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in multi-step approval processes
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
